entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 11:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
